hero.title: AI Development Meta-Framework
hero.subtitle: Unified platform for cost-optimized AI-powered software development. Simple tools, powerful results.

features.title: Why SimplyKI?
features.subtitle: Built for developers who want powerful AI tools without complexity or cost explosions.

unifiedPlatform.title: Unified Platform
unifiedPlatform.description: Single web interface for all your AI development tools. No more context switching between different applications.

costOptimization.title: Cost Optimization
costOptimization.description: Intelligent model selection and template reuse can reduce AI development costs by up to 70%.

pluginSystem.title: Plugin System
pluginSystem.description: Modular architecture allows easy integration of new AI tools. Build once, integrate everywhere.

easyIntegration.title: Easy Integration
easyIntegration.description: Git submodules and standardized APIs make it simple to add SimplyKI to existing projects.

monitoring.title: Monitoring & Analytics
monitoring.description: Real-time tracking of costs, performance, and usage across all your AI development activities.

productionReady.title: Production Ready
productionReady.description: Built with enterprise-grade security, scalability, and reliability from day one.

architecture.title: Architecture Overview
architecture.subtitle: Three-layer architecture for maximum flexibility and scalability.

webFrontend.title: Web Frontend
webFrontend.description: Browser-based interface built with Vue.js for modern, responsive user experience.

toolEcosystem.title: Tool Ecosystem
toolEcosystem.description: Collection of specialized AI development tools, each optimized for specific tasks.

coreInfrastructure.title: Core Infrastructure
coreInfrastructure.description: Shared foundation providing authentication, configuration, and plugin management.

tools.title: Tool Ecosystem
tools.subtitle: Integrated AI development tools, each optimized for specific tasks.

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.subtitle: Get SimplyKI running in minutes with our simple setup process.

cta.title: Ready to Build with AI?
cta.subtitle: Join developers who are already building smarter with SimplyKI's cost-optimized AI tools.
